name: Emiko's Pledge 2
description: Emiko's Pledge 2 is a 2D Platform Action game based on the story of a Half-Demon girl called Emiko, whose mission is to protect all the residents of the Ettaze state from the enemies who infiltrated into the territory.

name: Bitlands
description: Platform across strange, magical terrain while meeting even stranger friends and enemies! Discover the history behind the Bitlands, and unlock new allies and powers to traverse the dangerous worlds of the Bitlands, and restore peace to a broken kingdom.

name: Mauled
description: Mauled is a Free To Play, Third Person Shooter, CO-OP online, with procedural generated levels, infinite hordes of fierces creatures and many weapons to buy in citadels. Survive on a earth fallen into oblivion.

name: West Water
description: West Water. Population? You. Loot, Run & Survive.

name: Izmir: An Independence Simulator
description: Fight for the beloved city of Izmir's independence, a tower defence strategy game. Lead the common people of Izmir with tech gear from the future but be aware of holding the balance otherwise people could go nuts.

name: Temp Zero
description: Temp Zero is a minimalist roguelike which mixes intense action and musical bullet hell. Fight enemies which attack to the beat, choose perks, defeat the final boss, unlock new weapons, spells & soundtracks!

name: Obscurant
description: A narrative mimicry game. Observe and blend in to survive. Disguise yourself, deceive enemies, and discover the secrets of a mysterious world.

name: Rick and Josh adventures
description: Rick and Josh adventures - Logic puzzle platformer with a side view. The game is well suited for children, it develops logical thinking and reaction, even playing solo, controlling 2 heroes, the brain develops at the same time and new neural connections are formed.

name: Cursed Blood
description: Cursed Blood - This is a slasher with RPG elements, in a medieval setting, with a dark and gloomy atmosphere.

name: Five Stages of Pink
description: The story of a boy who wants a Normal life in the most Abnormal city in the world. Help Timor understand his cruel life in this supernatural city while trying to survive one more day.

name: Dungeon Rummage: Tiqee's Escape
description: Join Tiqee, a Human/Goblin half breed, on her adventures to escape the dungeon of Echeia.

name: Quantum Apex
description: Sci Fi Stunt/Street Racer With Nitrous. Strong emphasis on FUN! Handling Is a well balanced fusion of Arcade and simulation. There is no traction control There is simply the car, the player and the physics. Race Tracks are designed to test every Cm of your driving capabilities.

name: Betia Pera-pera English Adventure
description: Betia Pera Pera English Adventure is an immersion-type Interactive English conversation learning game in which users encounter battles and collect items by communicating with the characters of the game by listening, speaking, and writing, learning the correct pronunciation, and daily conversation as they play.

name: Deadly Dozen Reloaded
description: Deadly Dozen Reloaded is a complete remake of the original squad-based 3rd person shooter. Made in a new engine with upgraded maps, graphics and missions, Reloaded takes this classic franchise and brings it to modern audiences with a bang.

name: Dandy & Randy DX
description: Play either alone or with a friend on this cute adventure game!

name: Islandville: A New Home
description: Set off on an exciting journey in search of new lands and untold treasures in a new time management game.

name: Nintendo Switch Sports
description:
Get moving in Nintendo Switch Sports with Golf, Soccer, Volleyball, Bowling, Tennis, Badminton, and Chambara (swordplay) using Joy-Con controllers!

Controls are intuitive, so you can hit the court (or lanes, or field, or arena) and get started. With controlled motions you can curve your bowling ball, add spin to a tennis shot, or even use a Joy-Con with the included Leg Strap accessory to kick the ball in a Soccer Shoot-Out. Family and friends can join in on the fun on the same system or online.

name: Burning Faith
description: With its great production values, beautiful art and epic fantasy quest, Burning Faith is a Tactical RPG in the classic style of Feda the Emblem of Justice and Shining Force, that will satisfy the itch of T-RPG and RPG fans alike.

name: Carnage Offering
description: In 2527 in a dystopian world, Jake, an engineer and bounty hunter, travels to the far reaches of the universe through a wormhole. With the help of his friend Roy, Jake's goal is to exterminate the replicator robots that threaten the Confederate planets.

name: Sacred Valley
description: Go on a mission to find the Sacred Valley that's been a urban legend for as long as you remember. Travel through the world, meet new people & complete little quests for the people you meet. Can you reach Sacred Valley's heart?

name: Deep Fog
description: "Deep Fog" is a single-player 2D horizontal pixel horror adventure game. Explore the strange events that occurred in the fog city, 5 chapters will be phased release.

name: Psycho Bathroom
description:
Psycho Bathroom is a 2D boss rush game. In the bathroom you reside in, your toilet lid is broken. Every toilet flush is splashing aerosols all over the place. You, as a toothbrush, must eradicate the threat and protect your master.
Upgrade your gear! Meet new buddies! Bond with your master and explore his dark but comic story.

name: Mace: Mapinguari's Temple
description: Mace: Mapinguari's Temple is a multiplayer, horror game with adventure and social deduction elements. Venture into a maze-like, procedurally generated dungeon filled with puzzles, avoid the terrible creature that roams it's corridors and discover who is the deceitful cultist among you.

name: Argentum Online
description:
THE FIRST 100% ARGENTINE MMORPG
Argentum is a multiplayer online game, where you can take on the role of a warrior, wizard, paladin and many other classes, and explore the mythical lands of Argentum.

It was born 20 years ago as a game fully developed in Argentina and then released to the community for free. The code is accessible to all, thus allowing its evolution and continuity over time.

From the hand of the original creators of the game, Argentum Online resurfaces as a commemoration of the 20 years of its origin.

name: Hearts of the Dungeon List
description: Conquer dungeons, find romance, upgrade the town, build your stats, or just take it easy in this fast-paced turn-based RPG.

name: Ravenous Devils
description: An horror cooking simulator where you manage an evil family business. Improve your shops buying new tools and serve your customers.

name: A Way Back
description: A Way Back is a cute puzzle game where you play as a penguin who pushes or kicks plastic garbage blocks to throw them away in to a trash bin. Explore variety of challenging puzzles with tricky obstacles. Help the penguin to clean the environment around him and find a way back home!

name: Bitgun
description:
Bitgun is a top-down shooter with a lot of blood and zombies. Burn zombies with a flamethrower, shoot them in the face with a sniper rifle, or go berserk with a shotgun!

Make sure you bring enough guns because they will break quickly while you go on missions and kill hordes of zombies. You will be dodging zombies that are crawling out of the ground and jumping at you. If you die while fighting your way towards the zombie boss you will lose all your gear.

In a world where people are fighting among themselves as well as against hordes of zombies nobody trust anybody now, and people are afraid of getting infected. Penny is traveling alone to find a safe place, and soon she lands in a small camp in the middle of nowhere. Maybe this is her chance to find a home?

name: Retail Royale
description: A chaotic Battle Royale inside a furniture store where everything is a weapon.

name: Parallelia
description: Parallelia is a first person puzzle game with non-euclidean geometry which tries to offer a less ordinary experience. Explore a twisted history in twisted story made in a minimalist style. Pay attention to details and try to find the right path.

name: Hipster Cafe
description:
Ever wanted to design, build and manage a café on your very own home computer? Really? OK then... welcome to Hipster Cafe.
Use your trust fund to buy up some old warehouse building in the run down part of town then market it to the nouveau riche in a cynical attempt to drive up property prices. Can you successfully navigate the shifting waters of pop culture in order to market your eatery to the wealthiest demographic?

name: Taco Run
description: Take actor Danny Trejo on a journey to collect tacos and taco ingredients.

name: DCS World: A-10C Operation Agile Spear Campaign by Combat King Simulations
description: In a surprise move, Russia has, again, invaded Georgia and the United Nations is unable or unwilling to provide even the most basic military response to this attack. Initially, only the United States commits a small but highly effective force of A-10C Warthogs to help defend its Black Sea ally.

name: DCS World: F-14B Operation Sandworm Campaign by Sandman Simulations
description: It is the year 1998. Tension is building up in the Persian Gulf region. Violations of human rights, demonstrations terminated by the military and executions of political prisoners in Iran have led to financial sanctions set by United States and European Union. Iran has responded with airspace violations and disruptions of commercial shipping. Diplomats are doing their best but the Gulf states and the World are afraid of war.

name: Raisond'etre
description:
Will you be able to uncover your raison d'être and solve the mysteries that await in this suspenseful thriller?

In this 2D adventure title, players can explore as they please, examine objects, solve a series of riddles, and complete a variety of minigames.

name: Conduct Together!: Track Pack
description:
Expand your world with new exciting levels in new fun places, filled with new mechanics and conducting challenges!
The Conduct TOGETHER! Track Pack expands your Conduct-journey with 36 new levels spread across multiple familiar locales, and also the new Toy-world!

Some levels feature brand new Railway Crossings that you can activate to stop traffic. Now your trains can safely cross over busy streets!

The HQ has expanded as well! The Track Pack includes 7 new trains for you to add to your collection.

name: Me_Ion
description: Me_Ion is an online multiplayer shooter game with offline base-building mechanics, that's weird wacky and funny.

name: Colorfle
description: A daily guessing game where players must create a target color by combining multiple colors from a predetermined set. Each failed guess reveals information about which colors must be combined, and in which amounts.

name: Pagodia
description: Pagodia is a vanilla compatible episode for Doom 2 featuring varied, japan-inspired settings. The wad is split into 3 distinct themes: Village, Techno-shrine, and Cyberpunk City. Difficulties are implemented. Mouselook, jumping, and crouching should be disabled if you're playing on a port with those features.

name: Chungo's Gauntlet
description: Fight through 70+ stages of retro action and strange internet culture, as you make it through Chungo's Gauntlet. There'll be many traps, strange enemies and strong bosses waiting for you.

name: Killer Bunny
description: Killer Bunny is an action-based platformer where players will traverse wild lands as a bunny protagonist, hunting the wretched spiders and snakes that killed their parents. At the end of the game, the bunny will face “Daddy Snake” and “Mommy Spider” — the primordial beings responsible for all spider and snake spawn.

name: Sex Diary: Swingers Yacht
description: An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of two college buddies sharing their gorgeous soon-to-be wives on a luxury yacht.

name: Wet Dreams
description: Wet Dreams is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Soto Nemuri
description: Soto Nemuri is a Yume Nikki/Touhou fangame, made for Touhou Fan Game Jam 8. You play as Sumireko from the Touhou series and explore her dreams.

name: DJMax Respect V: Muse Dash Pack
description: DJMAX RESPECT V - Muse Dash PACK! Now enjoy the songs of Muse Dash in DJMAX RESPECT V.

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Robot Rebellion Pack
description:
It's a Robot Rebellion! As in, we rebel against the Robots of the dreaded Rivals - but in style! Spice up your look with four new sets of unique armor (one per class), new helmets, and new Paintjobs. The Robot Rebellion Pack - crudely cobbled together during those long nights spent on the Space Rig waiting for the next engagement. The opposite of chic, perhaps, but eminently usable.

- 4 unique suits of Armor, one for each Class
- A unique helmet in two variants (Full Face & Half Face)
- Robot Rebellion Paintjob for other Armors
- Robot Rebellion Paintjob for your Weapons
- Robot Rebellion Paintjob for Bosco
- Robot Rebellion Paintjob for your Pickaxe

Important note: The contents of this Pack are cosmetic only!

name: Buff Doge
description:
Hide in the back rooms from the scary buff doge or he will kill you. In this scary horror game you have to beat the difficult maze, behind every corner there could be a terrifying monster! Or is the monster already among us?

Find weapons to defend yourself from the buff doge. The back rooms are full of surprises, do you have what it takes to win against the buff doge?

name: Truth Loop
description:
Truth Loop is a short game with a scary story and bizarre moments...

It has a "loop" style of gameplay, you keep repeating an action while the game and the story progress.

name: Queen Mary's Script Retold
description:
Queen Mary's Script tells the peculiar story of a girl thrust into the world of dolls and contracts. Join Mary, Clause and Edmund as the three travel between worlds, facing their past demons and learning more about themselves that they never intended to. They question just what it is they want as well as if it's worth the sacrifice to get it.

Queen Mary's Script - Retold is a complete overhaul of the main game. Updated graphics are not the only thing you'll see. Story changes, new havens/characters and different outcomes for certain characters will give you a whole different experience from the original!

name: Castlevania: Circle of the Moon GBC
description: Made in Game Boy studio 3.0.3, play a small segment of the catacombs and enjoy skeletons, bats and bone pillars getting in your way as you attempt to level up and farm candles for random drops of hearts, healing potions and the knife sub weapon.

name: Voidland Mystery Goodnight
description: Voidland Mystery Goodnight is about a girl in college who realizes she has prophetic dreams. They start out mundane, seeing what lunch will be or seeing an accident before it happens. They start to get more intense. She sees angels. She sees demons. She can't parse what she sees.

name: Bokura no Ninja World
description: Sin descripción

name: Donkey Kong Heardle
description:
A clone of Heardle for Donkey Kong music.

Each Donkey Kong Heardle is randomly chosen from Donkey Kong's discography.

name: Wing
description: In "Wing", you play as a fledgeling who fell from the nest, learning to fly as you climb back up to the sky.

name: A Fungus in My Garden
description: A Fungus in my Garden is a VR first person shooter where you have to save the Kingdom and Humanity fighting against Giants and mutant insects.

name: Adibou
description: Abidou is an educational game for kids between 4 and 7 years old.

name: Almost Home Now
description: A 10 minute horror experience of a girl walking home alone at night.

name: Star Wars: Heritage Pack
description: Five great classic STAR WARS games

name: Aria Chronicle: Necroknight Amazon Bundle
description:
This bundle contains the following:
- Aria Chronicle
- Additional Hero, Necroknight
- Additional Hero, Amazon

name: Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream - Extra Scenario/Area: Atelier Plachta
description: An additional story episode with young Plachta as the main character, set in the time after she arrived in Erde Wiege and before she first met Sophie. Players will play as Plachta, with Diebold and Ramizel available as party members.

name: R00m
description: Move through 3D space to find hints, solve mysteries and escape from the room. Anyone can play to the end because you can see hints and answers.

name: Century: Age of Ashes - First Flight Edition
description: Take it to the skies and become a legendary dragon rider, with an extra jump start thanks to the Introduction Pack!

name: Rogue Lords: Day One Edition
description:
A dark fantasy roguelike where you play as the Devil!
Lead famous evil geniuses through events and turn-based fights to spread terror and corruption. Create synergies between your disciples, use your evil powers and take revenge on those miserable Demon Hunters.

name: Fallen London: The Queen of the Elephants
description:
An addon for Fallen London is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones.

The Queen of the Elephants was the Exceptional Story for May, 2022.

name: Save Room: Organization Game
description: When you enter a save room you know you are safe, no danger can come to you, you can relax. Take advantage of this short period of time to organize your inventory, heal your wounds and reload your weapons. Can you make all the items fit in your inventory?

name: Pixel Game Maker Series Fish Tornado
description: A simple action game that all you need is your left stick! Turn your fish into a giant swarm and take down your enemies!

name: Rock 'n' Roll Will Never Die!
description: Hair metal's not dead, it just smells funny! Get your denim vest, bandana and makeup, and dive into a point-and-click adventure as a middle-aged teddy bear planning a comeback with his old glam metal band – in a world where glam metal has been dead and buried for decades.

name: Tigey's Gift
description: Tigey's Gift is an addictive Physicals Ping Pong Arcade game. Shoot 5 different balls to feed the cat with tin, catnip, love, toy and water. Essential things for all cats. Feed your kitty and make her wish true.

name: Ping Pong Arcade
description: Paddles at the ready!

name: Arise: A Simple Story - Definitive Edition
description: Your adventure of love and loss.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Fish Tornado
description: A simple action game that all you need is your Left Stick! Turn your fish into a giant swarm and take down your enemies!

name: Our Ninja World
description: Take on our top-secret training games and transform into the ultimate ninja! Pass around Joy-con controllers and play with up to four players! We've got every tool a ninja needs: throwing stars, ninja swords, grappling hooks, and even flying squirrels!

name: Underdog Detective
description: Underdog Detective is a video-based playable, interactive story Set in the reign of Empress Wu Zetian of ancient China, you will play as a slum dweller in the imperial capital of Luoyang and embark on a thrilling yet comedic adventure! Traps and conspiracies, comradery and your unknown origin...

name: Knotwords
description:
Knotwords is a minimal and elegant logic puzzle — with words.

The rules are simple: arrange the letters in each section so every word is valid, across and down.

Each puzzle may seem difficult at first — but like all my favorite newspaper puzzles, it gets easier as you progress. Each step guides you naturally towards the solution.

name: Parallel Lab
description: A two-player cooperative puzzle adventure, that is all about communication. Players have to follow parallel paths, explore a secret laboratory, describe what they see, and work together to unravel the mystery. Parallel Lab is played on two devices with a browser.

name: Get Packed: Couch Chaos
description: Get Packed: Couch Chaos is the expanded edition of the couch co-op removals game that’s full of calamity and physics-based carnage for 1-4 players, and it’s now on Nintendo Switch!

name: Turn Tack
description: A world on the verge of doom, and the girl who holds the key. An exotic puzzle-platformer adventure game based on Aztec myth in South America.

name: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition - Dynasties of India
description: This expansion brings three new civilizations of India plus three full new campaigns to Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition for the first time.

name: Nomad Survival
description: Battle against hordes of enemies, conquer Boss encounters, and explore various character and skill combinations in this time-based auto-attacking Roguelite in your quest to become stronger and defeat the most menacing of creatures that lay in wait at the end of each run.

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 13
description: Help run Pinecreek Hills and New England’s Minuteman Valley Help the famous Park Rangers run Pinecreek Hills. Have fun organizing events on Bluewaters lake, Cherokee river and Apache trail.

name: TVG Journey
description: Voxel-like medieval escort game.

name: Panmorphia: Awakened
description: A point and click, puzzle adventure game set in the magical world of Panmorphia. Wield the Amulet and transform into one of the four animals that represent the four elements. Each change also brings a unique perspective of the world.

name: The Jelly Adventure
description: The Jelly Adventure is a puzzle-casual game peefect for kids or even for those who had a more stressful day.

name: Marble Ball Friends
description: This is an online cooperative Corinth-game like game that can be enjoyed by one or all, based on the theme of healing in nature. Cooperate with other players and aim for the jackpot.

name: HunterX
description: HunterX is an action-adventure game full of spirited battles. Use various styles of weapons and magic to experience your own fighting style and explore a great world.

name: Desaturation Point
description: A Strategic Squad-Based Horror Game in which players navigate across arctic labyrinths overrun by freakishly colorful monstrosities in this 'Lovecraft-on-LSD' experience.

name: My Girlfriend is a Musician
description: “My Girlfriend is a Musician” is a Music Tour Management Simulator and Yuri Dating Simulator. Play as an aspiring junior tour manager helming a series of concerts around Europe for an eccentric yet extremely entertaining Rockstar!

name: Wish of Abyss Dungeon
description: A real-time strategy to explore the dungeon.

name: Terranova
description: A nostalgic interactive fiction game set in the early 2000's. Chat with your friends, update your LimeJournal, and discover yourself through a rich world of storytelling, love and friendship.

name: The Long Road North
description: A story-driven game supported by the song Cold Burn from Cult Of Luna

name: Marble Maid
description: A cutie in a maid uniform prepares to tackle her dirtiest job yet! In this puzzle ball adventure, you’ll control the adorable maid as she rolls around a larger-than-life estate and clears away the dust bunnies plaguing each room. Chase down and eliminate at least 3 dust bunnies and roll to the goal before time is up, and you’ll clear the stage!

name: Trapper: Drug Dealing RPG
description: Drug Dealing RPG rogue-like strategy crime saga with choose your own adventure elements. The police and the jackboys aren't your biggest enemy... Time is!

name: Bounty Game
description: Do you have a dream of becoming rich overnight? Then come and make that dream come true in The Bounty Game!!!

name: NeuroWorm
description: A 6DoF take on the classic game concept set in cyberpunk future, where sentient programs escape the grasp of their creators.

name: New Terra
description: New Terra is a challenging and addictive multi-directional gravity-based space shooter. Fuel goes fast and is hard to come by. Hauling cargo makes your ship very heavy and mobility becomes limited. Strategy and resource conservation is key to completing your missions or you won't survive.

name: Sword of Atlas
description: Sword of Atlas combines tactical grid combat with turn meter action economy to create a fast, frenetic, and strategic gameplay experience unique amongst the TRPG genre. The real-time action combines with a character-driven story to create a high-stakes environment where your actions will determine the fate of your party.

name: Hishou Same! Same! Same!
description: Toaplan shoot ’em up collection Hishou Same! Same! Same! includes Hishouzame (known in the west as Flying shark) and Same! Same! Same! (known in the west as Fire Shark), as well as ports of the home console versions of each title. Included as a bonus is Toaplan platformer Wardner.

name: Nurse Enjoy Gyaru Pack
description:
This edition includes the following:
- Kiss Kara Hajimaru Gyaru no Koi: Kurumi no Uwasa to Honto no Kimochi
- Boku to Nurse no Kenshuu Nisshi
- Boku to Joi no Shinsatsu Nisshi

name: Chigau!!!+: Premium Edition
description:
Mirai Minato, a boy student who attends Mokuyo High School, is woken up by a noisy childhood friend who takes care of him as usual.

This edition includes the following PS4 Game:
- Chigau!!!+
- B2 Tapestry
- Original Soundtrack
- Original Acrylic Key Chain

name: Chigau!!!+
description: Mirai Minato, a boy student who attends Mokuyo High School, is woken up by a noisy childhood friend who takes care of him as usual.

name: Kiss Kara Hajimaru Gyaru no Koi: Kurumi no Uwasa to Honto no Kimochi - Premium Edition
description:
Second-year student Utazawa Hiroki has the disposition to want to help people in trouble and his interest is directed at the girl sitting next to him in class: Hiiragi Kurumi.

This edition includes the following PS4 Game:
- Kiss Kara Hajimaru Gyaru no Koi: Kurumi no Uwasa to Honto no Kimochi
- Tapestry
- Original Soundtrack

name: Kiss Kara Hajimaru Gyaru no Koi: Kurumi no Uwasa to Honto no Kimochi
description: Second-year student Utazawa Hiroki has the disposition to want to help people in trouble and his interest is directed at the girl sitting next to him in class: Hiiragi Kurumi.

name: Cities: VR
description: Be the mayor in Cities: VR, the ultimate VR city-building and management simulator. Step through the screen and control every aspect of city planning - design neighborhoods, construct buildings, direct the flow of traffic - all while you handle economics, emergency services, and more. Cities: VR brings the definitive city-building experience from Cities: Skylines into VR for the very first time.

name: Bugsnax: The Isle of Bigsnax
description:
Journey to a mysterious new island where the Bugsnax are truly enormous! You’ll need to master new mechanics like the Shrink Spice, which can cut the giant Bugsnax down to a catchable size. Joining you are Chandlo, Floofty, Triffany, and Shelda, who will explore both the island’s long-forgotten history, and more of their own personal stories.

Back in Snaxburg, you’ll finally have your very own hut! You can take on challenges from your mailbox to earn furniture and accessories to customize your living space. These challenges put a few twists in the gameplay, and will shake up how you explore and catch.

And last but not least; capture rare Bughats in order to dress up your favorite Bugsnax.

name: Spirits of the Hellements
description: Assemble legendary Spirits and defend against the endless hordes of Hell. A tower defense where you must shape the battlefield and create a maze using the three Hellements. Use Fire, Lightning, and Wind tiles to trap your enemies, or augment your defenses.

name: Facteroids
description: Facteroids is a 3D factory building game about asteroid mining in space. Prospect, mine and manage your production lines in a variety of scenarios and procedurally generated worlds across the entire Solar system.

name: Aria Chronicle: Necroknight
description: The “Necroknight” is a Hero practicing necromancy. When they receive damage while protected by the “Bone Armor,” the enemy will receive damage in return. This “Bone Armor” can be stacked up to increase effectiveness, or removed to deal damage to the enemy, giving a new edge to your party.

name: Kaiju Wars
description: Play out a Kaiju movie as the (hopelessly) outclassed military in this stylish 2D turn-based strategy game. Construct buildings and defend your city with cannon-fodder tanks, jets and more as the devastating kaiju grow in power with every attack.

name: Flatworld
description: Explore a world full of magic, puzzles and enemies in which the main character is the weakest.

name: The Last Poem: The Trials of Poe
description: The Last Poem - The Trials of Poe is a third person action RPG set in the mid-1800s that sends the player into the shoes of Edgar Allan Poe. It combines combat elements like those found in Dark Souls and related games with the RPG and travel elements found in games such as Kingdom Hearts.

name: Universal Enemies
description: Join Riana and her team to stop a conspiracy of monsters that have gone berserk. A depth-scrolling action shooter with lots of characters and monsters!

name: Dino Nest
description: Dinosaur survival management game. Lead your own pack of dinos and feed to grow bigger. Can you survive or will you become extinct?

name: Kapital: Sparks of Revolution
description:
Kapital is a hybrid of city-builder and society management game. You play as a new mayor of the city that was recently destroyed by war. Your goal is to restore the city to former glory by managing limited resources, resolving social conflicts and overcoming crisis situations.
The population of your city consists of 3 classes: nobles, bourgeois and workers. All of them want a better tomorrow.

name: Holomento
description:
Holomento is an indie permadeath RPG focusing on the dangerous quest of passing through the mysterious Eventide Hollow – and rebuilding it step by step.

Explore a hand-crafted open world featuring procedurally generated dungeons!
Fight your way through Eventide Hollow – again and again!
Rebuild the Hollow and release it from its ruinous curse!

name: Haiku, the Robot
description: Enter a strange and unexplored land full of adorable robots, hidden secrets, and evil virus-infected machines. Discover different weapons, items, and abilities that will help you progress and discover new areas.

name: Rogue Legacy 2
description:
Rogue Legacy is back! But now it's got a 2 on the end of it!

Rogue Legacy 2 is a genealogical rogue-lite. That means it has all the trappings of a typical rogue-like (randomized runs, changing characters, and more), but with persistent upgrades, and persistent dead heirs. In this game, your legacy defines you. Spend your parents’ inheritance and grow the family manor to give your children a better fighting chance. Each child is unique, with their own traits and abilities. Your daughter could be a Ranger. She could also be vegan. It’s a new experience every time. Rogue Legacy 2 also lets you play how you want to. Go hard and fast, and dive deeper into the depths of a randomly-generated world. Or take it slow and steady and build your character up until you’re ready for greater challenges.

name: Balkadia
description: A 2D action-platformer in-development where you whip anyone and anything into pieces to save your son. A playable stage is now ready for your feedback through the demo below.

name: Piko Piko
description: Take control of Piko, our hammer wielding heroine, as you bash things up with a big hammer in this cute Anime-styled 2D metroidvania-inspired adventure! Uncover mysteries! Beat the bad guys who do naughty things! Explore the Piko Piko world with her floof fox friend!

name: Guilt: The Deathless
description: Multiplayer third-person survival action RPG set in a gritty, dark fantasy world of bone and misery. Players will explore the seemingly endless Trail of Bones, fending off nightmarish threats and encountering other players at random.

name: Drug Story: The First Chapters
description: Follow the story of a young boy who discovers one day that his older brother, Zack, is a drug dealer. He will try to convince him to stop this illegal activity, but it will turn into a big journey filled with battle against criminals. Defeat the Boss of the gang to save your brother, and the town.

name: Lunares Insaniam
description:
A ZX81 conversion of Ocean's Transversion, an early ZX Spectrum game.

Simple, challenging and fun to play, this is a fast action game with support for the Chroma colour interface and a couple of joystick options. Features a demo mode and high score table

name: Make Me Real: Worthlessness Selected
description:
Make Me Real: Worthlessness Selected is a collection of delinquent unreal top-down action experiences revolving around localized incidents in a realm known to most as "The Dream World".
Prepare for possibly one of the most chuuni things to ever exist and witness a cacophony of noise, charged weaponry, and a sword that might just be a tad too long for its own good.

name: Plants Vs. Zombies Expanded and Enhanced
description: Sin descripción

name: Dungeons and Monsters
description: An episode for Heretic replacing the original first for Limit-removing ports. Made on the basis of different images from google for the query "dungeons maps". There are some textures from Hexen, Hexen II, Heretic II, Witchaven and a few of their own.

name: Irkalla
description: This 11-map set is a pseudo-reimagining of Doom I Episode 3: Inferno, except in Doom II and using Boom features and expanded limits. It should work in anything that can handle the equivalent of complevel-9. Expectations may be subverted, and there should be some surprises along the way!

name: Ever Maiden: Daraku no Sono no Otome-tachi
description: This story is about “Puellarium", a school isolated from the outside world by fog and thorns. Here strict discipline is always in effect, where the air always tense and time never disturbed. However, one morning a girl was found unconscious in front of the school gate. This gate is always closed and should only open on special occasions. The guards, on alert, asked her to name herself to which she replied "Alouette." At that moment, the bell of the clock tower, which was rusty and always silent, rang out. "When the bell of the clock tower rings, the end of this school will come soon."

name: Warframe: Angels of the Zariman - Emergence Pack
description: Venture into the dark Void of the Zariman with a fully reinforced Arsenal! Add new Weapons, Customizations, Boosters and more to your Arsenal for a limited time, including the evolving Tenno badge of honor, the Vasero Sekhara, and the striking Hespar Scythe.

name: Warframe: Angels of the Zariman - Chrysalith Pack
description: Venture into the dark Void of the Zariman with a fully reinforced Arsenal! Unleash electric fury as the newest Warframe, Gyre; unlock a bounty of new Customizations with Voidshell Warframe Skins; and master brand-new Weapons as you bring light to the dark and deadly Zariman.

name: La Villa de la Muerte
description: La Villa de la Muerte is a looping psychological horror game where players will progress through an ever-changing environment in pursuit of the truth behind a family disappearance.

name: Kirby and the Forgotten Land
description: The first level of the Switch game, now available on your Gameboy Color! Features most mechanics from the original game.

name: Don't Toy With Me
description:
For a long time now, Dahlia has lived by herself in the Dollhouse with only the stuffed rabbit Wisker for company. One day the owner of the toys decides to present her with a new companion, a sad clown puppet named Huxley. She's delighted for the company but, as the owner soon realizes, it's not so simple to introduce a new friend to the household.

What happens when you play favorites? Are you really in control of the Dollhouse? Or are the toys about to get out of hand

name: Call of Duty: Vanguard - Season Three
description: The third season for Vanguard and Warzone is known as Classified Arms. Learn about prototype weaponry, updated Points of Interest on Caldera, S.O.T.F Harpy, and what Titans will make an impact during Operation Monarch…

name: Goo Game
description: A music demo in disguise as a little Playdate Pulp adventure game.

name: It's Still a Space Thing
description:
Your space base is under attack! Evil bosses and minions have taken over!
Gear up with special attacks and enhancements to rid your home of menacing machines.
You are the lone wolf, tasked with this mission.

name: There's a Rikishi in my House
description: A casual escape game with 15 multiple endings.

name: Chrysalis Inc.
description: Slipping between the past and present, a child puzzles their way through a crumbling toy factory filled with the remnants of its child workers and the grudges they bear.

name: Layer Section & Galactic Attack: S-Tribute
description: The vertical shooting game with gorgeous 2D animations and lock-on lasers is back with new features and online ranking!

name: Arcade Archives: Youkai Douchuki
description: "Youkai Douchuki" is a side-scrolling action where players control "Tarosuke", a mischievous, playful boy who always troubled his village with pranks.

name: Warframe: Angels of the Zariman
description: The Zariman Ten Zero cries out into the endless darkness that surrounds it. In a post-New War world, something lingers in the Void-ridden ship once inhabited by the Tenno. Its wailing can be heard from afar. Return to it, find the source of its song, and unearth the memories echoing throughout the vacant corridors.

name: Elemental Angel III
description: "Elemental Angel III" is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the universe.

name: Dissonance
description: Dissonance is a top-down 3rd person adventure game. Players will encounter supernatural anomalies and creatures. Find and use specialized gadgets to aid you in your journey. Explore the abandoned research facility and reveal the secret of the organization that sent you here.

name: 7Swordsman
description: A medieval turn-based RPG

name: Gabriel's Auditory Playground
description: Gabriel's Auditory Playground has no graphics, no visuals, no way to experience the gameplay with your eyes. In Gabriel's Auditory Playground, your eyes have no use. Put your ears to the test and play through mini-games designed without sight in mind!

name: The End of it All
description: The End of it All is an isometric adventure game where players must control a large cast of characters and exploit personal relationships to take over a small town one person at a time.

name: The Ssum
description: New mobile otome game from the creators of Mystic Messenger.

name: Splinters of Regret
description: Splinters of Regret is an action, bullet hell game where you fight manifestations of regrets. Using the power of Splintering, make your way through the land of regrets to escape.

name: Tavern Crawl
description: Tavern Crawl is a alcohol-fueled adventure starring Fish, a young mouse on a quest to save his kingdom’s supply of booze from a gang of thieving rats through combat and crafting cocktails.

name: Abyss Memory Fallen Angel and the Path of Magic
description: Worldwide Drawing Adventure Challenge Strive forward with easy-to-learn controls. Drawing action! Protect, connect, aid, and guide with your mouse. Mariel will continue to walk in a single direction. Draw paths with your mouse and aid Mariel on her adventure through the Abyss.

name: Romans: Age of Caesar
description: Build Rome Together! A co-operative grand strategy MMO from a team of veteran city builders, Romans: Age of Caesar is the latest historical strategy game from Firefly Studios.

name: Uncle Nook's Monster Emporium
description: Explore your way through a procedurally generated haunted mansion. Watch out for monsters and deadly traps that block your way. Only with creativity and persistence will you make it out alive!

name: We'll always have Paris
description: We'll always have Paris is a short narrative experience about loving someone with dementia.

name: The Amulet of AmunRuuuuuN
description: Dive into AmunRun's pyramid in this cooperative escape room game with a friend to recover the pharaoh's amulet. Collaborate & communicate to work out the ancient enigmas that will lead you to the funeral chamber and avoid falling into deadly traps on your way out.

name: Forgotten Hill Tales
description: A violent tragic event of the past forced you to live for years locked up in the little cabin in the woods, but the day has come when you will get out of there, whatever the cost… A journey to a faraway country, the discovery of a strange painting and the desire to own it.

name: Unsouled
description: Set in a beautiful but haunting world, Unsouled is an atmospheric Action-RPG about a mysterious power used with deadly purpose - featuring highly-stylized combat that’s fast-paced and rewarding.

name: Ironlaw
description: Ironlaw is colony management game set in a procedurally generated world. Form alliances with other civilizations, fight battles with your enemies and build colonies.

name: The Stanley Parable: Ultra Deluxe
description: The Stanley Parable: Ultra Deluxe is an expanded re-imagining of 2013's The Stanley Parable. You will play as Stanley, and you will not play as Stanley. You will make a choice, and you will become powerless. You are not here to win. The Stanley Parable is a game that plays you.

name: Prehistoric Kingdom
description: Prehistoric Kingdom is a zoo management game that gives players total control over the creation of their extinct animals and exhibits.

name: Crimes of Passion
description: Crimes of Passion, Book 1 is the first book of the Crimes of Passion series. It is followed by Crimes of Passion, Book 2 and Crimes of Passion, Book 3.

name: World at War: Nazi Zombies Remastered
description: This mod is a "remastered patch" for the Call of Duty: World at War stock zombie maps. The aim of this project is to modify these maps with bug fixes, quality-of-life tweaks, fixed inconsistencies, new features inspired by Black Ops 1, and a few creative additions such as adding back cut content or storyline-related Easter Eggs.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle: Futanari Massage
description: Challenging jigsaw puzzles, featuring adult images of a woman and her futanari massage therapist.

name: Posterdle
description:
You have 20 seconds and 6 guesses to figure out the movie poster.

Every day there will be a new poster to guess. Have fun and good luck!

name: WWE 2K22: Banzai Pack
description: Banzai! Hit the ring Yokozuna, Rikishi, the colossus Omos, Kacy Catanzaro, and ‘The Samoan Bulldozer’ Umaga, as well as Evo MyFaction cards of all five playable Superstars. The Banzai Pack is already included in the WWE 2K22 Season Pass.

name: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Turnabout Dimension
description: A familiar face has recently gotten his wish granted. But it seems like that wish brought with it a series of unfortunate events. However not all is lost for someone arrives to save the day! Can you figure this mess out?

name: Sphere Game Legendary
description: The newest game in the sphere game franchise now, with new mechanics and challenges. Grab metal bars to pass the obstacles and reach the portal to the next level. Game developed by Diego Paes.

name: Trial Xtreme Freedom
description:
Gear up for high-speed action in Trial Xtreme Freedom! Blaze through Career Mode, compete in Global Tournaments, craft unique bikes, and become a racing legend!

Get ready for the adrenaline-pumping motorcycle racing experience of a lifetime in Trial Xtreme Freedom! Take full control of your destiny as you rev up your engines and embark on a thrilling journey through a world of high-speed, death-defying tricks, and two-wheeled excitement.

Experience Multiplayer Social Racing and go head-to-head in global races against real players. Feel the rush as you challenge friends and rivals in real-time, PVP races, and prove who the real champion is. The competition is fierce, and victory has never been more satisfying!

name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War - Left 4 Dead Bundle
description: This Character Pack contains 8 Characters: Bill, Francis, Louis, Zoey, Coach, Ellis, Nick and Rochelle.

name: Cozy Grove + New Neighbears Bundle
description: Welcome to Cozy Grove, a game about camping on a haunted, ever-changing island. As a Spirit Scout, you'll wander the island's forest each day, finding new hidden secrets and helping soothe the local ghosts. With a little time and a lot of crafting, you'll bring color and joy back to Cozy Grove!

name: This is a game
description: Sin descripción

name: Cozy Grove: New Neighbears
description: Word of your legendary scouting deeds has spread throughout the spirit world... and that means more ghosts want your help. The "New Neighbears DLC" adds four new ghost bears, each featuring lengthy personal stories and no long waits between their requests.

name: Loony
description: Loony is a multiplayer strategy, role-playing and thriller where one player takes on the role of the killer and kills those who try to escape from the map, and other players try to escape the map by finding the killer or completing missions.

name: Sway
description: A short experimental bullet hell. Traverse a dubious reality. Talk to manifestations of your own insecurities. Avoid bullets like you avoid your real-life problems.

name: Magic Tower: Destroy the Wormhole
description: Magic Tower: Destroy the Wormhole is a fixed value strategy game. Similar to the gameplay of the classic magic tower, on this basis, new gameplay, rich skills and prop types are added. Players can choose different routes to train the role.

name: Curtain Call
description: "Curtain Call" is a visual novel about (literally) breaking through social masks by forming meaningful connections with incredibly deep personalities. Whether you’re looking to make new friends or something more, there’s a whole cast of characters just dying to meet you!

name: DogeFight
description: DogeFight is a third-person multiplayer game where you can play with your favorite memes and be the last survivor by defeating your opponents, and gaining social credit. But be careful not to be sus.

name: Arcana Twilight
description: "Arcana Twilight" is an 'otome' card battle game with six charming wizards!

name: Salome's Kiss
description: A lesbian gothic romance tale set in Victorian England, in which an anxious governess is aggressively pursued by her unruly, tempestuous pupil.

name: Seven Mortal Sins X-Tasy
description: An RPG that is all about indulging in your wildest fantasies and temptations! You'd be committing a mortal sin if you don't play this game!

name: Galactic Civilizations IV
description: As the all-powerful leader of a spacefaring civilization, you must seek out new star systems and discover the exciting potential of the subspace realm. There are thousands of worlds to colonize and dozens of civilizations - both old and new - to encounter.

name: The Serpent Rogue
description: The Serpent Rogue is an action-adventure game built around exploring a medieval fantasy world, mastering the art of alchemy, and taming wild creatures. You play as the Warden, a mysterious alchemist, who needs to put their skills to protect this realm from the encroaching Corruption. Craft, brew, boil & concoct and protect the realm from The Serpent Rogue!

name: City Wars: Tokyo Reign
description: City Wars: Tokyo Reign takes the customization and strategy of a traditional CCG and introduces a dynamic battlefield where tactile mechanics and turn-based battling combine. Choose a Faction, build a Combat Case and take to the streets.

name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War - Mission 9: Return to Hell
description: It’s time to finish this! Learn the sinister secrets that set the Zombie apocalypse in motion and venture deep into hell itself as you sprint to rescue a fallen ally from a fate worse than death, a space known only as the Void. Will the forces of the occult have their final victory, or will the bell toll for them?

name: King Arthur: Knight's Tale
description:
King Arthur: Knights Tale mixes an XCOM-style turn-based battle system with traditional RPG mechanics, including character development, choices that impact the direction of your campaign, and upgrading your home base of Camelot.

The story follows Sir Mordred, who travels with a band of knights across Avalon in search of King Arthur. This is already an interesting twist on the classic legend, as Sir Mordred is King Arthur's nemesis, traditionally shown as the king's traitorous nephew.

In this version of the tale, Mordred has actually mortally wounded Arthur, and is now stalking him through the isle of Avalon to finish the job on command of The Lady of the Lake.

name: Sway
description:
A short experimental bullet hell. Traverse a dubious reality. Talk to manifestations of your own insecurities. Avoid bullets like you avoid your real-life problems.

In Sway you play as a nameless girl who has suddenly found herself in a surreal and hostile world. With no other option, you must press forward through an onslaught of bullets in hopes of finding a way back home. This game features over 45 beautifully-drawn backgrounds paired with 4 original piano compositions. You'll fight 23 unique enemy types and face-off against 5 challenging bosses.

name: Mandela Effect Brain Test
description: Test your mind with over 350+ Mandela Effect examples.

name: Ambulance Emergency Simulation
description: New case information is constantly coming from your radio, you should pick up the patient and take him to the Hospital as soon as possible.

name: Bomb Jack DX
description: A big overhaul of Bomb Jack for the Game Boy. Adding colors, fixes and improvements.

name: Harlequin Fair: Harbour Dawn
description: Return to Toronto's sullen streets — now raked by northern winter winds — in this free expansion campaign. Come back to the realm of the masquerade dreamer: come back to the Harlequin fair.

name: Effugium
description: Explore a cold, abandoned, and dreary facility to piece together its mysteries and find a means for escape from the horror that lurks within.

name: Barro F22
description: Barro F22 is the new generation for the fast version of Barro, now with a new style of race tracks but, with the good old toy car/ go kart arcade style!

name: In the Nick of Tie-m
description: Join Nick in his getaway chase and escape the scene of the crime by stealthily making your way through the city back to his hideout. Traverse rooftops, sneak past searchlights, hurtle through windows into apartments, and climb up fire escapes in order to escape. Avoid making too much noise or standing in the light for too long because the police will detect you!

name: Ghostwriter
description: Ghostwriter is a singleplayer typing game that pits your words-per-minute against poltergeists who have nothing better to do. Type whatever shows up on the monitor and meet your quota before the time limit. Encounter a variety of ghost types that will interfere in different ways. Buy upgrades and powerups to give yourself an advantage. Improve your words-per-minute and have fun while you are at it!

name: Our Lady of Sorrow
description:
An unmarked tape discovered in the archives of an abandoned church containing strange footage was recently discovered.

The tape was deemed extremely dangerous by the Catholic Church and was hidden away.

name: Out of the Blue
description: Out of the Blue is relatively simple, you wake up in a maze and you need to find your way out. You fight enemies, explore the map, collect items and manage your resources (such as bullets, water, grass, and tea).

name: Friday Night Funkin': Dearest Double Date
description: On a lovely friday night, Boyfriend and Girlfriend are taking a break in GF's bedroom. Unfortunately, the Dearest family knows all... Does BF really know what he's in for?

name: 01's Blackhole
description: 01's Blackhole is a singleplayer 2D top-down bullet-hell RPG about Jack getting sucked into a blackhole and has to find his way back home and stop who is creating the blackholes.

name: Pimiento
description: Pimiento offers 3 daily word-guessing games. They rely on a dictionary where semantically closed words got pushed together in a gigantic, cloudy database, so that two given words get a "similarity score". In each mini-game, each guess must be a word and the game will tell you how close to the secret word you are.

name: The Hong Kong Massacre / Beautiful Desolation Bundle
description: If there are two things most people love in life, it’s science fiction and blasting things! We’ve put together two of our titles in a special package that will have you exploring African-inspired future landscapes and shooting your way through legions of adversaries in the underworld of Hong Kong. This is an epic bundle you don’t want to miss!

name: Urubu
description: Urubu is an Online co-op, payload & Gestion Elements. You play as recruits from the lastest division in their final test to join the ranks of Urubu

name: Sweet Solitaire. School Witch 2
description: Master magical knowledge with the young witch!

name: Valentine's Day Griddlers 2
description: 120 new Japanese crosswords – stroll through the most romantic locations!

name: Clockwork Kingdom
description: 1-bit dungeon crawler

name: No Prince Needed
description: No prince needed is an adorable 2D puzzle platformer where you play as a princess which was kidnapped by evil wizard. Use ability to throw boxes and solve unique puzzles. Escape the castle with the power of your intelligence and platforming skills!

name: Speedcat
description: Speedcat is a tiny 2D platformer where you play as a cat trying to pick up all 32 Speedcoins! Run, jump, and use the environment to navigate your way through the map as quickly as possible. Developed on PICO-8 by Fletch, the game is delightfully small and easy to pick up, with an estimated completion time in under an hour.

name: Gold Wiper
description: Gold Wiper is an arcade game like Qix and Gals Panic. If you delete the screen and restore the hidden picture, you will be rewarded incomparably with Qix and Gals Panic.

name: Revenge of the Killer Octopus
description: Revenge of the Killer Octopus is a third-octopus game where you shoot and possess your way through throes of enraged scientists in order to take your revenge!

name: JellyMen
description: JellyMen is a chaotic split-screen party shooter where the goal is to be the last player standing to claim victory. Take advantage of a plethora of weapons to shoot, explode and pummel your enemies while avoiding the environmental hazards and destructible levels

name: Polygon Fantasy
description:
Modern ARPG inspired by diablo-like RPG genre: Slay monsters, loot, get stronger
Polygon Fantasy is an old-school RPG in beautiful graphics and with modern nice-to-haves.
The Twisted Realm’s corruption is spreading. Make your stand and uncover ancient secrets in this breathtaking story-driven RPG!

name: Soul In the Chamber
description: Bound to the soul of an assassinated emperor and equipped with only one bullet, traverse and fight through the stylized world of Soul in the Chamber as you try to uncover the mysteries of a fallen empire and survive the collision of two dying worlds.

name: Hard Times at Sequoia State Park
description: Sequoia State Park, known for its' fresh air, bears, and girls who love massive wood! An erotic interactive narrative, join Chloe as she starts her first day on the job as a park ranger! Chloe is going to have a HARD time keeping her own redwood from sprouting up!

name: NeverDeath
description: NeverDeath is a fighting game set in our own solar system centuries in the future. Explore the intricacies of the unique left/right fighting system while battling across the solar system as nine distinct characters.

name: Research and Destroy
description: Research and Destroy is a turn-based action game with simultaneous local or online co-op. Take control of three brilliant scientists as you research and develop strange new weapons and gadgets to destroy the Supernatural hordes that have all but crushed humanity!

name: Boogie Loops
description: A pizza, a bunny, a cactus, and a panda wander into the woods. Nobody suspects they can dance, but secretly they share dreams of spreading their fuzzy, spikey, cheesy joy far beyond the woods and into the great wide world. But there's a problem: they’re missing music. That's where you come in. Set the beats for their boogie, the tones for their twerk, the swing for their steps.

name: Crankin's Time Travel Adventure
description: Crankin loves taking naps, but that is always the cause of more trouble. Being late to work or missing flights, and today he woke from a nap at the exact time he was supposed to meet a date. Advance or rewind Crankin's timeline. Hurry to the meeting place where your loved one, Crankette, is waiting, and apologize for being late.

name: Draco Knight
description: Fight the forces of evil as a knight of the order Draco. Draco Knight is an action platformer that utilizes twin stick controls to provide easy to learn but hard to master gameplay. Prepare yourself for a fast paced, action packed and exciting combat experience, all whilst exploring a fantasy world filled with horrifying enemies and...

name: Metal Mind
description: An organization called AWC consists of politicians, scientists, engineers, and agents, thinks robots don't deserve their own consciousness, so AWC captures intelligent machines in the worldwide, deprived of their consciousness, convert them into slaves and battle machines.

name: My Strange Plane is a Thing Body Moves Through
description: Walk among weird objects in a weird place and hear them talk (maybe) about life

name: Memory Puzzle: Futanari Threesome
description: Train your brain with this memory game, revealing the naughty sexual adventures of 2 girls and a futanari character, in images hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match.

name: Santa Claus Journey
description: You are Santa Claus. Deliver all gifts to all people around the world. Precision and quick response is required to accomplish the task in this fun game. Best played during the holiday season.

name: Plastic Model
description: A very short, free to play game about assembling a plastic model kit. Made by Mike Inel.

name: Harvest Moon: Intuitive Ranch Master
description: Sin descripción

name: Block-Quake
description: Block-Quake is a total conversion mod that replaces all of Quake's vanilla models with familiar looking "blocky" monsters, weapons, items and bosses! Included is a Block-Quake update that adds new plastic replacements for the Copper mod (you'll need the regular Copper mod for Block-Quake's version to work correctly)

name: Momo's Diary
description: Momo is a supercute doll with a lot of friends who love her dearly...watch as she sinks through the depths of hell!

name: Tochi
description: Tochi is a simple Action-Adventure game set in a dungeon filled with enemies that will attack you without a second thought! And if you die it's game over! Made exclusively for the Playdate!

name: Love is… in Small Things
description: "Love is... in small things" is a hidden picture game with emotional art by artist 'Puuung'. It is a healing game that can relieve stress and excitement like relaxation, and enjoy the charming emotional coloring game that spreads at your fingertips.

name: 1001 Jigsaw: Earth Chronicles 8
description: 1001 photos of our fantastic planet! Discover the breathtaking beauty of our world alongside 1001 Jigsaw: Earth Chronicles 8!

name: Jimbob and the Magic Chain
description: A platformer game about chain warfare.

name: Tobor Party
description: A local multiplayer racing game where you play as Tobors driving around the UTD campus!

name: The Nightmare Catcher
description: The Nightmare Catcher is a Sci-fi FPS exploration game, created by the solo developer XAEON GAMES, use an arsenal of weapons ranged, melee, grenades, magic habilities from the aztec gods, unleash the power of magic and technology to craft items and discover new unique habilities.

name: The Eternal Battlefields
description: The Eternal Battlefields is a turn-based tactical game with RPG elements and a loot system, emphasizing on battles. Get a random army in the High Score mode and try to reach the highest level of The Eternal Battlefields or try to beat the final boss in the Roguelike mode.

name: Seclusion Sword
description: Sin descripción

name: Mini Asteroids
description:
Modern approach to the classic retro arcade.

You will control your rocket in a deep space surrounded by asteroids and sneaky aliens. Destroy them and avoid hitting any of them.
Collect power-ups and buy improvements. Choose between levels or arcade mode.

* Easy to learn, hard to master
* Sharp vector graphics
* Precise and smooth controls
* 50 levels and arcade mode
* power-ups and improvements

name: Exhibit of Sorrows
description:
Not all is well in the Exhibit of Sorrows. Move through this progressively creepy exhibition and check out the strange dolls on display. Interact with the dolls to reveal the keys. Be prepared to do terrible things to escape.

The mood gets darker and more unsettling as you progress. You will encounter the same exhibitions in disturbing new forms as you become increasingly more panicked to escape. You will have to make cruel decisions in order to leave.

Regardless of the sinister undertone to the game, there is a story to learn that will keep you gripped to the end. Exhibit of Sorrows is an excellent horror game worth seeing through.

name: Incompatible Fusion Machine
description: A scene kid's misadventure

name: Shadow of the Elders
description: Sin descripción

name: Lo-Rez
description: A one level PICO-8 demake of Rez for the Dreamcast by Morgan Quirk.

name: V64
description: A vanilla-compatible community mapset inspired by dotQLL's GADOLINIUM, where maps don't exceed the limit of 64 vertices.

name: Touhou Dream Runner
description: A one button rhythm action game that Youmu beats her enemies(?) to the beat.

name: After the Inferno
description: An adult visual novel set in an original fantasy world. Featuring animated and voice acted scenes, both NSFW and SFW.

name: Quake: Realms of Tiddles
description:
Seven classic maps made in 1998-2001 by Peter Bisseker, also known as Tiddles. A variety of themes (base, rogue brick, wizmet) in an early yet distinct style.

All levels were released separately, but were intended to lead into each other. This release is a modern repackaging by historical map appreciator Greenwood, curating all of Tiddles' single player maps together into a convenient episode.

name: Pictode Collection
description: Never enough puzzles!

name: Bunny Girl Story
description: The girl works in the Bunny Club. She loves to sing songs and dance. But she is alone. However one day there is an opportunity to change everything.

name: Present Memories: A Vox Akuma Fangame
description:
Present Memories is a very special project dedicated to the Nijisanji EN's voice demon, Vox Akuma.

In this visual novel adventure game, you play as Vox himself as he explores his memories and leave no stone unturned for an unforgettable experience with his clan of the past.

name: The Pigeon P
description: The clicking adventure you and your friends need. Donate gifts to the incoming drivers with our here of the game The Pigeon P.

name: F.I.D.O.
description: Follow the very unique premise of an indie horror game about a demo-.... ok maybe not so unique, but we have a dog so there's that.

name: Shell Girls in Puzzle Skulls
description: Strip puzzle with skulls and monster girls.

name: Hexadecordle
description: A daily word guessing game where players are given 23 guesses to uncover 16 hidden words. Also includes a free-play mode for unlimited play.

name: DotStrike
description: DotStrike is a 2D top-down shooter. The players are large dots with a tapered nose. Players are divided into two teams: red and blue. Fight both bots and real players on the local network or via the Internet!

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 1 - Episode 03
description: This DLC gives you access to Season 1 Episode 3: PB's All That! Pizza Boy’s determined to become a Cool Kid but he’s a fashion disaster! Cody takes him to the skateshop to get decked out!

name: Nyo-Nin-Jima: My New Life in Charge of a Tropical Island
description: Stepping ashore a remote southern island, the protagonist’s battered spirits are soothed by the lovely Kowakame family that takes him in. However, many more unexpected surprises await him on the island...

name: Ja'afar's nightmare
description: Ja'afar is a little kid who is been through an accident lately ... a car accident ... he survived with all his family members for sure but the accident affected him and for the first time of his life he experiences a weird but unique nightmare ... you have to reach the end of this nightmare.

name: Sonic Dimensional Funkin'
description: Sonic Dimensional Funkin' is a Friday Night Funkin' mod based on the Sonic the Hedgehog series, featuring six weeks and 17 main songs, with a few extras.

name: Flower Sort Puzzle
description: Flower Sorting Puzzle is a simple logical colorful game similar to water sort puzzle games. No time limit, just daily challenges to solve. Enjoy many levels and quizzes to solve.

name: Fruit am I?
description: This is a game for Weekly Game Jam 249 and the subject is Mysterious Fruit.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CFCLA, RailFirst, Freightliner GE C44aci Pack
description: The C44aci is a model of Australian heavy duty diesel electric locomotive designed operated by a number of rail freight operators. This pack features CFCLA, RailFirst, and Freightliner livery units, with custom cab views, full PBR textures, and more.

name: The Tennis Master
description: The protagonist of this adult visual novel is a disgraced former tennis champion. The former champion is hired by a mysterious businessman to coach his daughter Sofia.

name: Kuggs
description: Kuggs is a fast-paced shooter with some light horror elements. Fight off hordes of enemies and grow stronger over 70 levels.

name: SitBar's CT Pack
description: SitBar's CT Pack is the first Custom Track Distribution for Mario Kart 8 Deluxe to exist. It replaces every track in the game with a custom one and alters its presentation and UI.

name: Burger Run
description: Burger Run is a Runner style arcade game where the user leaps and dashes through obstacles to get to the finish line. Play and survive through 12 levels of as you complete your quest as a Cheeseburger.

name: Road Rewind
description: Sort out a busy traffic by driving each car safely to its destination. Time rewinds everytime you complete a path, so mind your actions or deal will consequences!

name: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers Rise of Sh1ft3r - Arctic Challenge
description: Take your combat racing career to cool new places, with the Fast & Furious: Spy Racers Rise of Sh1ft3r: Arctic Challenge DLC – including four sub-zero new tracks, most-wanted characters, new vehicles, and spy gear that will give you the edge!

name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon: Complete Edition
description: Have you ever wondered what it’s like to run your own breakfast kitchen? In Breakfast Bar Tycoon, you'll learn that it's no easy task! You will take on the role of a breakfast bar manager and try your best to serve the hordes of hungry customers as quickly as possible. Take orders, prepare dishes and fight for tips! Invest your earnings into upgrading your restaurant and become a breakfast magnate!

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley
description: Pull out weeds, plant new apple trees and gather the literal fruits of your labour. With time, you'll discover ways to make your life easier and explore this charming 2D world.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Coalmint Mountains Railroad
description: The Coalmint Mountains Railroad (CMR) is a 50mile route based in Pennsylvania in the Appalachian Mountains in the 1950s. There are many steep grades to climb, and even more tight corners to wind as you explore the majesty of the Appalachian Mountains in Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter all by rail.

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Fellow Edition
description: Stand out from the crowd with the Fellow Pack - an epic heap of dragons, customisations and consumables fit for every true dragoneer who want to leave their mark in the history of Century: Age of Ashes.

name: Evoke
description: Evoke is an escape room game for mobile devices. Players control a character who has woken up in a room without any memory of their identity; they must solve the puzzles in the surroundings to resolve the mystery.

name: Rail Trail
description: Rail Trail is a game where you need to create rail systems that will guide gold to its destination.

name: Mayapan
description: Conquer the great pyramid of Mayapan by showing your point and shoot skills. Match colors and make use of special bonuses. Feeling good? Try the Survival chamber, at the pyramid's lower level. Resist as long as you can.. or taste the heated lava! Compete with other Oculus players in the general leaderboard! Be the best!

name: Lofi Funkin'
description: Sin descripción

name: Still Heroes
description: A digital comic about the story of Emeline. She tries to live her dream of being a superheroine after her friends decided to change their career paths. A gentle and moving story, drawn by hand.

name: 3D Puzzle: Farm House
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.

name: Timeline
description: Timeline is a turn-based strategy game where you can play through the human history from stone age to modern times. In the game you command wide range of units, make them collect resources and build buildings, towns and cities, explore the map and meet other players controlled by AI.

name: You Will Die a Lot Buddy, Trust Me!
description: A challenging platformer where you have to overcome obstacles. Avoid rays and spikes using the grappling gun. There are checkpoints for each room, so don't be afraid to die. And finally see your rank on the leaderboard at the end of game.

name: Cursed 2
description: Search a desolate town for traces of your childhood friend. A point&click adventure with action combat.

name: Moonshot: A Journey Home
description: Moonshot: A Journey Home is a physics-based puzzle game where you play as Moon Pi, a young moon separated from Mother Earth. Using slingshot mechanics and navigational puzzles, help Moon Pi trek across the mysterious universe to finally get back home.

name: Immortal Mantis
description: Discover secrets, solve puzzles and survive the serial-killer in this pixelated topdown. You are Akin, an exterminator, who bought a house in a rural area, but the past of this house will affect your present.

name: Administrators
description: A visual novel in which you have to try on the role of the administrator of a small provincial hotel. There are many different rumors about the hotel. But sooner or later, even secrets turn into a routine…

name: Foreign Galaxies
description: After a galactic portal failure you find yourself lost in a galaxy 500 light years away from home... With your main propulsion systems disabled you are unable to traverse space, so you try to collect resources you find near you in order to create a galactic portal to return back.

name: Shotgun King: the Final Checkmate
description: It's chess, but you replace your entire army with a royal shotgun, with some roguelike elements.

name: Ratuz
description: After a science experiment gets out of control, you need to survive and escape this dark prison that hides weird secrets. The game is a cinematic platform of terror and stealth, inspired by Inside, Another World, Blackthorne and Prince of Persia.

name: Dragon Princess Anastasia
description: [Black-and-White Short Comedy RPG] Tons of trouble caused by the dumb dragon princess!? Search for treasures hidden inside the cave!

name: Wizard Mike
description: Darkness came over the magical kingdom. The most powerful wizards stood against evil forces. But the enemy was too strong. The battle was lost.

name: Wind Angel Challenge
description: Wind Angel Challenge is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the universe.

name: Evasion From Hell
description: Escape all 9 circles of hell by showing off your 3D platformer skills. A beautiful world full of surprises, challenges and lost souls is waiting for you.

name: Sakura Hime 2
description: Surrounded by many beautiful girls, a mind-blowing, sexy journey in Fairyland has started. While enjoying the time with a lively cat girl, passionate bunny girl, mysterious witch, or an incredible magician, do you want to save the world at the same time?

name: Ver
description: Ver is a horror adventure game where you as the player try to end a curse by collecting five crystals. Loot batteries, medical supplies and energy boosts all to aid you on your adventure of stopping the curse. Watch out for the roaming mutants which only have one goal, chase you down and kill you...

name: Action Sandbox
description: ACTION SANDBOX is a sandbox game that focuses on action. Creation can be created using the provided kinetic materials. Control the creation and complete the goal.

name: Ganryu 2
description: Play as Miyamoto Musasho in this beautiful 2D platformer and travel through a 17th century fantasy Japan, from north to the island of Ganryu-jima where everything happened between Musashi and Kojiro. The game is inspired by the story of Takezo Musashi from the famous novel "The Stone And The Sword".

name: Out of the Park Baseball 23
description:
The 2022 release of Out of the Park Developments' award-winning baseball franchise.
Officially licensed by MLB, MiLB, and the MLBPA.

name: Traitors in Salem
description: Social deduction game from the creators of Town of Salem, BlankMediaGames

name: AI War 2: The Neinzul Abyss
description: We have encountered the Neinzul before, but never like this. Play as a Necromancer, as a Suzerain, as a Lone Ark, or with or against many of the varied new factions this expansion brings.

name: A Day of Maintenance
description:
A Day of Maintenance is a new, unusual kind of exploration game, taking cues from In Other Waters, 17776, Signal from Tolva, and Euro Truck Simulator 2.

It's a mixture of a visual novel, driving game, crane game, fixing game, and some other stuff too.

name: Dash Hale
description: A fast-paced runner with roguelite elements set in a dynamic, freely rotatable world: speed up or slow down by changing the ground incline, turn it into a steep slope for sliding, or leave it altogether and drop all the way down - bringing your enemies along.

name: sQuiz
description: An online quiz website, with public and private rooms, various themes and several difficulties.

name: Gladom: The 2D MOBA in Pixel Art
description: MOBA in 2D Pixel Art fully online PVP oriented. Select your unique hero to fight in teams of 4v4. Gain gold by last hitting stone minions, killing enemy heroes or destroying towers. Use gold to buy items at the shop to increase your power. Competitiveness and game balance are our main goals.

name: Remorse: The List
description: Remorse: The List is a classic survival horror game where the player must figure out what is happening in the little hungarian town of Hidegpuszta, and your only clue is a list that doesn't make much sense. Exploring every nook and cranny of this place will be the key to unveiling its secrets and get out of there alive.

name: Skábma: Snowfall
description: The rhythm of nature is in danger! You are Áilu, a young Sámi whose ordinary reindeer herding day turns into an adventure. Learn the old ways of the Noaidis, Sámi Healers. Harness the powers of the Noaidi Drum and the Familiar Spirits to fight against a disorder spreading across the land!

name: Winkeltje: The Little Shop
description: Winkeltje: The Little Shop is all about building, decorating, and running your own old-world fantasy shop. Buy low, sell high - from nails and apples to swords and alchemic love potions. Impress your customers, craft items, and be the master of your very own shop.

name: Bot Gaiden
description: Stage completion time affects both boss health and rewards! Every 15 seconds, the Golden Skull will fill up a battery. If you haven't reached the Henchbot (boss) yet, it will be added to his health. After you defeat him, any remaining energy is converted to batteries you can spend on upgrades (which help you go faster)!

name: Razor's Edge
description:
Sarah Stone, a renowned reporter and expert fighter, decides to rescue her sister kidnapped by a gang of criminals that have taken over the city. On her journey she will encounter several enemies ready to stop her from completing the mission.
Sarah knows the dangers, her life is on a razor's edge...

name: Type & Hope!!
description:
Type & Hope!! is a typing game created by Segawa.

Theodore is an apprentice wizard who has to take lessons from multiple teachers who will be able to teach some skills and abilities in order to reach his goal.

Type & Hope!! is an adventure game made on RPGMaker 2000 that has been released the 21st of April 2022 by Segawa.

name: Friday Night Funkin': vs. Homr
description:
This is the VS HOMR mod.

Yeah, not so dumb, a full week and 3 songs in freeplay

Idk

Cool songs I think

name: Neptunia: Sisters vs. Sisters - Day One Edition
description:
The Day One Edition of Neptunia: Sisters vs. Sisters includes:
- The Game
- Reversible Cover Sleeve
- Set of 5 Post Cards
- Set of 4 Stickers
- B2 Cloth Poster
- Collector's Box

name: Skeleton Bros
description: Sin descripción

name: Discone
description: The first disc in the pondlife disc series; a run & jump & talk 'em-up. an opportunity to interact with your controller.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Street Fighter Ryu
description: Sin descripción

name: Neptunia: Sisters vs. Sisters - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:

- Digital Artbook*
- Soundtrack (x9 Tracks) *
- PC Theme*
- PC & Mobile Wallpapers (x5 & x13) *
*Note: Once purchased and downloaded, the digital artbook, soundtrack, PC theme, and PC wallpapers can be found in the "Deluxe Set" folder in the game root directory.

- Swimsuit Costume Set**
*The Swimsuit Costume Set is purely cosmetic. The set provides swimsuits for the Goddess Candidates and the Goddesses.

Costume "Morning Glory" (Nepgear)
Costume "Little Polka-Dot" (Uni)
Costume "Cobalt Dive" (Rom)
Costume "Pink Dive" (Ram)
Costume "Beach Fresh" (Neptune)
Costume "Girly Campus" (Noire)
Costume "Aquamarine Shell" (Blanc)
Costume "Floral Paleo" (Vert)

- Adventurer's Pack**
**The Adventurer's Pack includes the followng in-game items:
15 Healing Grass Z
5 Life Fragment Z
5 MEGA Juice Z
5 MEGA Capsule Z
5 MEGA Pill Z
3 Panacea Z
2 All Heal Z
1 Magic Crystal Z

name: Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector - Necrons
description: Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector is a fast-paced turn-based strategy game set in the grimdark universe of the 41st Millennium. Pick your force, develop your army, field mighty heroes and fight for victory using superior strategy, awesome abilities, and devastating weaponry.

name: Hot Wheels: Haunted Customization Pack
